General Admission:
USD 20
Seniors/Students:
USD 15 (must present valid ID)
Group Admission (10 or more):
USD 10/each
Multi-Day Pass (4-day entry):
USD 25/each (inludes re-entry for all public hours)
Free for children under age 10
manamiami.highlights: Dirty Geometry: Latin American Geometric Art curated by Oswaldo Romberg

sculpt.highlights: Part of SculptMiami collection will be shown in the Sculpture garden on 46 NW 36th Street, Miami FL 33127 and can be visited from Monday to Friday from 11 am – 6 pm
